Subject: matlab errors with ctmethods.dll

Many thanks to everyone who has helped already and offered suggestions
as I have worked to build Cantera from source on Windows using VC7.

I have built matlab and have compiled ctmethods.dll.  However, this
dll seems to be incomplete.  Specifically, when I run matlab code
calling cantera methods, I get 

-----
Unable to load mex file:
C:\cygwin\home\hunt\cantera\cantera\Cantera\matlab\cantera\ctmethods.dll.
The specified module could not be found.


??? Invalid MEX-file
'C:\cygwin\home\hunt\cantera\cantera\Cantera\matlab\cantera\ctmethods.dll':
The specified module could not be found.
-------------

If I replace the dll I built with the dll in the pre-built windows
install, I do not get this error.  

I tried using recent code from cvs, as well as code from as far back
as 10/12/04 with the same results.  Has anyone else succesfully built
and used the ctmethods.dll with Matlab lately on a Windows machine? 

I do not have Fortran installed and I am using the minimal
installation of Python.  

Thanks in advance,
Rebecca
